Halifax and Langwith thirds grind out draw

Langwith held on to their very early goal, courtesy of James Newsome, to drag out a draw against a Halifax side that dominated possession

Defending champions Vanbrugh firsts came out on top against Derwent firsts in a fiery and controversial encounter on the JLD this afternoon

After David Moyes was chosen as Sir Alex Ferguson's successor at Old Trafford, Rohan Banerjee questions the appointment of the Everton boss

Nervy men's volleyball team ousted in four sets

Luck was not on the men's firsts volleyball team's side as they were edged out by a score of 1-3 by a spirited Lancaster side

Netball firsts impress despite Lancaster win

The pressure was on for York and Lancaster's netball firsts clash to deliver high drama and sporting excellence, and - despite York losing to a team that possessed greater finesse and pace in the centre of the court - it absolutely delivered

Ruthless James destroy Langwith

A ruthless performance from James seconds on the JLD today saw them brush aside the Langwith thirds 9-0. Braces from Peter Mabe, Sam Taylor and Ralph Gill sealed a very impressive James victory

Vanbrugh grind out win over plucky Goodricke

Defending champions Vanbrugh firsts put in a solid but not spectacular second half performance to beat Goodricke seconds 2-0 after an underwhelming first half

Derwent demolish Halifax thirds

Derwent firsts opened their College Cup campaign in style, as they strolled to a comfortable 5-0 win over Halifax thirds in Group D

One-way traffic as Goodricke firsts quash Langwith

After failing to score in the first half, Goodricke shook off the dust from the spring break by producing a dominant performance against Langwith seconds on wind-swept JLD

Plucky Halifax snatch win from postgrads

Halifax seconds began their College Cup campaign with victory as they squeezed past Wentworth thirds on a windy JLD

Dominant Alcuin crush Vanbrugh

Blustery conditions did not prevent Alcuin firsts from putting three goals past Vanbrugh thirds in their first matches of the College Cup group stages, in an efficient display from the side

Lancaster take the spoils in table tennis

The York table tennis team was not expecting to do fantastically against Lancaster in this year's Roses, but unfortunately they were on the end of a hammering by the Red Rose

Squash firsts in superb Roses win

York men's firsts squash team were a force to be reckoned with at Roses 2013

Indoor football firsts dominate to claim points

The indoor women's firsts football team set the Sports Tent ablaze on Saturday afternoon when they comprehensively defeated their Lancastrian rivals in front of a lively crowd

York triumph in indoor women's seconds

A late penalty was not enough for Lancaster to rescue a draw as the women's seconds team proved their credentials in a well-fought 3-2 victory in front of a rowdy crowd in the Sports Tent

York sailors take dramatic Roses win

A dramatic final race win saw the White Rose claim four points in Saturday's sailing fixtures

Women's football see off Lancaster to take Roses points

A swashbuckling performance from the Women's 1st XI Football team in front of a jovial crowd on 22 Acres saw them turn on the style to brush aside the Lancaster team 3-1

Superb Vanbrugh put Goodricke to the sword

An excellent display from the Vanbrugh 2nds on the JLD today saw them beat their Goodricke 3rds opponents 3-0

Men's firsts run riot in Roses hockey encounter

A large vocal crowd were treated to some excellent hockey on the JLD, as the Men's 1st team ran out convincing 4-0 winners against a Lancaster side largely unable to trouble their opponents

Sublime York thrash Lancaster in mixed badminton

York dismantled Lancaster in the Badminton mixed doubles 8-1 to take home the Roses points, with Dani Farsiani and Andy Henderson among the White Rose stars

Lancaster see off spirited York in Roses darts

The Roses ladies' darts contest saw the clashing of two hugely enthusiastic teams as York lost 7-2

Spirited Alcuin hold Derwent to surprise draw

Alcuin thirds held Derwent seconds to a hard-fought 1-1 draw this afternoon on a scorched JLD

James get Fyled away in Roses clash

York's sublime comeback in the third quarter was well quelled by the visitors as they came out as 26-32 victors

Classy James hit five past Wentworth

James firsts got their College Cup campaign off to a flyer, as they beat Wentworth firsts 5-1 in Group B

UYAFC outmuscled by gritty Lancaster

UYAFC fell 1-0 to a physical Lancaster side on the final day of Roses as they failed to avenge last year's defeat

York reign supreme in glorious weekend

It was truly a weekend to remember. We were treated to a Roses victory of crushing magnitude, providing the perfect end to an already brilliant year in the world of York Sport

Lacrosse women batter Lancaster opponents

The women's lacrosse team completed Roses' biggest thrashing of the tournament as they brushed past an almost non-existent opposition in the form of Lancaster

Heroic firsts snatch epic women's volleyball win

The York women's volleyball firsts claimed an extraordinary five set win over Lancaster on day three of Roses 2013 after saving four match points

York women's basketballers crushed by Lancaster

Despite battling hard, York's women basketballers were outclassed by a higher quality opponent in the Sports Hall. In every aspect of play, Lancaster bettered the White Rose

Men's football seconds narrowly lose out to 10-man Lancaster

Despite battling hard, York's football seconds were unable to find the scintillating form they showcased throughout most of this year, ultimately losing out to two headed Lancaster goals
